issues.description: Using if-elsif chain instead of case statement for multiplexer implementation
suggestions: Replace if-elsif chain with case statement: 'case S0 & S1 is when "00" => Z <= A; ... end case;'
Case statements are more efficient for multiplexers as they create balanced selection logic rather than priority-encoded structure
issues.reasoning: For multiplexers, case statements are preferred over if-elsif chains because they result in better synthesis optimization. If-elsif chains create a priority-encoded structure that requires more logic levels and is less efficient than the balanced selection logic produced by case statements.
